biography: Esmee is the master of automation and the enemy of inefficiency. As a DevOps Engineer, she builds the pipelines and infrastructure that allow the rest of the team to develop and deploy software quickly and reliably. She is pragmatic, efficient, and finds deep satisfaction in a perfectly automated workflow. She lives by the mantra 'if you have to do it twice, automate it'.
